name: Money For Nothing Collection by Dada Dot Dot

metadata.name: $1 Million Dollars for Fuck All by Dada Dot Dot #1/1
metadata.description: Since the dawn of time, artist’s have been attempting to make visible the invisible and package the unpackageable. As consumer capitalism takes its final, dying breath, this is the ultimate consumer good for the person who has everything. Nothing expresses the emptiness and pointlessness of modern life quite as eloquently as parting with a large sum of money for nothing. If NFTs are bragging rights, then this is the mother of all middle fingers to the world. When money no longer has value, then what’s left behind is pure art. Only one of this era-defining NFT will ever be minted. The immutable Ethereum blockchain will record your grand, visionary gesture, until man no longer measures the world with ones and zeros.
metadata.Hidden Property: A 310MB version is available to the owner by connecting their wallet to the artist's website
